name: Bomba Ball
description:
Bomba ball is a brand-spanking-new sport that combines physical excellence and high explosives.

As coach, assign your players roles to play and let them do the work. But remember: The one who makes a goal blows up with the bomb, so you'll have to plan ahead to manage your team well!

Play against Ai or another person!

(made in about 24 hours for LD43)
